markdownRemark.excerpt: JIRA-integrated web application used by drop build partners to update TELUS facilities and address inventory. This tool replaced manual…
markdownRemark.html:
JIRA-integrated web application used by drop build partners to update TELUS facilities and address inventory. This tool replaced manual spreadsheet processing and automated the intake of this data to TELUS’ inventory.

I worked closely with members of the MxU program team, MxU build partner representatives, JR Howden’s Broadband Systems team, TOPPS, Facilities, and BT’s Address Management and Environment Management teams to successfully design, develop, and deliver this application.
